name: SWAPGEIST
description:
One soul with no body, but with a desire to kill.

This soul is pissed and want to kill some baddies, luckily this forest is full of sword wielding bandits, crazy bats and lazy explosive slimes. Possess any baddy you want but be careful to not die whilst possessing!

___________________________________________

WASD or Arrows to move

Space to possess and de-possess a body

You can choose whichever shift button you want to use to attack

___________________________________________

Part of the Chicken Crew Spooky Collection.

Music by Brainfoam.
